The before time is 5 minutes.



We will not allow customers to schedule an appointment starting at 10:00. There needs to be at least 5 minutes of free time in your calendar.



The next available time slot we show on your booking page will be from 10:05.

User

TevoMx.message: SoPlan.com is perfect for any type of business that is looking to improve their efficiency when it comes to scheduling appointments. We eliminate the back-and-forth messaging so you are no longer interrupted with e-mails, text or calls. This allows you to focus on your business and let SoPlan.com do the scheduling. You are always in control over your calendar availability. You can specify meeting duration, location, days of the week, between which hours and how much time you would like between appointments. There is no other tool on the market that makes scheduling so easy for you and your customer.

YQyjFO.message: Our competitors lack innovation and have poor user experience. For example, with SoPlan.com your customers can easily connect and overlay their calendar on top of yours so they don't have to switch back and forth between 2 apps. We ensure that scheduling an appointment saves time for you and your customers. We value the privacy of everyone visiting and using SoPlan.com, we don't use Google Analytics for example. We value you and we ensure that you can always contact us through our live chat or e-mail. We always strive to find a solution to your problem and value your feedback.

Yf823m.message: With SoPlan.com there is nothing to manage anymore when it comes to appointments. We take care of everything. From booking to rescheduling and cancelling. You no longer need to be involved in this time consuming exercise. Your customers can schedule, reschedule or cancel appointments 24/7 without your interaction. You can easily go on vacation and have your appointments automatically booked during your holiday without ever having to answer any e-mails and checking your calendar. We will send a confirmation e-mail to you and your attendees so you know what is coming when you get back to work.

Customers can't schedule an appointment with you within this time. This gives you sufficient time to prepare for your appointment.



For example:

With a minimum notice time of 1 hour, customers are only allowed to book an appointment that are at least 1 hour from their current time.



Default value: 1 hour

ZT9c2g.message:
Customers are allowed to book an appointment up to 365 days in the future.



For example:

If the value is set to 7 days, customers are only allowed to schedule an appointment between today and 7 days in the future.



Default value: 60 days

ZpY6LB.message: There is no need to panic if the time or location of your event changes. With SoPlan, you can edit and update events and meetings anytime you want and we will automatically send notifications to everyone invited.

a5IYU4.message: Never go to a meeting unprepared ever again. With SoPlan, your attendees will be able to send you essential documents beforehand. You can attach and send documents which requires no technical expertise! Anyone can do it.

aboutUsPage.paragraph1.message: SoPlan was born out of the idea to make scheduling appointments simpler. We were tired of relying on emails to schedule appointments and jumping through hoops to get the hang of all the responses.

aboutUsPage.paragraph2.message:
We decided to put our collective IT expertise to good use and design an innovative scheduling platform. Following the secure-by-design principle, we brought the SoPlan idea to life, enabling people to plan and manage appointments quickly and effortlessly.



We are a team of passionate IT professionals with a mission to help businesses and individuals streamline their appointment and meeting scheduling. Thanks to our founders’ extensive background in IT security, software development, and IT architecture, we provide seamless digital experiences to all our customers.

aboutUsPage.paragraph3.message: Our core values are Care, Clear, Commit. They are deeply ingrained in our company culture and guide us in everything we do.

aboutUsPage.paragraph4.message:
We are transparent and dedicated to helping people schedule appointments and connect without worrying about data privacy and security. We care about our customers and strive to make their lives easier through clear, hassle-free scheduling.



Life’s too short to waste time going back and forth to plan and manage social and business appointments. With SoPlan, planning is truly made simple.

You can add multiple time intervals to a single day and select the “I’m not available” option for any weekday, making bookings unavailable at that time.



You can specify multiple time ranges on a single week day.

For example

08:00 till 10:00

11:00 till 12:00



This means that between 10:00 and 11:00 customers can't book an appointment.

odLDTA.message:
Recurring

Customers can schedule an appointment indefinitely in the future based on the "rolling days" value you have specified.

By default, customers are allowed to book 60 days in the future.



Date range

Customers are only allowed to schedule an appointment between a start and end date.

This schedule will be automatically disabled after end date.



Specific date

Customers are only allowed to schedule an appointment on one specific day.

This schedule will be automatically disabled after this date.

schedule.integration.disabledWarning.too.message:
We are having issues trying to get your availability from your Microsoft or Google calendar. The booking page of this schedule won't be accessible for your customers until this issue is resolved.



Some reasons why this could have happened.



Reason:

You or an admin from your organisation has revoked SoPlan.com to access your Microsoft or Google account on your behalf.



Solution:

Reconnect this calendar account from your integrations located in Settings.

After successfully reconnecting this calendar account you will see a duplicate entry, no worries, after a refresh it will be gone. You have now successfully reconnected your Calendar account.
We are having issues trying to get your availability from your Microsoft or Google calendar. The booking page won't be accessible for your customers until this issue is resolved.

securityPage.block1.text.message: SoPlan.com uses TLS 1.2 or higher and strong cryptography to establish a secure connection between your device and our servers.

securityPage.block2.text.message: We store your data using encryption-at-rest, meaning no unauthorized user could ever decrypt it. If anyone gains unauthorized access to our data center, the virtually impenetrable AES 256-bit encryption will prevent them from making sense of the data.

securityPage.block3.text.message: Only you can access your SoPlan account. You will receive a verification code (valid for three minutes) every time you attempt to log in.

securityPage.block4.text.message: We don’t believe in dishonest tactics for making a quick buck. Your privacy is our top priority, so we will never sell or share your data to third parties.

securityPage.block4.title.message: We don’t sell or share your data

securityPage.description.message: Here at SoPlan, we highly value privacy and data security. Our founder is a cybersecurity expert who ensures our users’ personal and sensitive data stays safe and secure, no matter what.
